text:
Millie Bobby Brown (born 19 February 2004) is a British actress and model. She began acting in 2013. She is best known for her role as Eleven in the Netflix series "Stranger Things" (since 2016). The role gave her a Primetime Emmy Award nomination. She will appear in the 2019 "Godzilla" sequel, '. Millie has also starred in the music video of the Maroon 5 song "Girls Like You". She has also released a new line of makeup and skincare called “Florence by Mills”
Brown was born in Marbella, Andalusia, Spain to British parents. She grew up in Bournemouth, England. She follows the Premier League football club Liverpool.
